edu.bard.drab.PCLT
Class PCLT

java.lang.Object
  edu.bard.drab.PCLT.PCLT

public class PCLT
extends java.lang.Object

The PCLT object is used to track laser points in a video source such as a webcam and transform them into the coordinate system of the processing sketch. This way the laser pointers can act like mouse pointers.

Author:
Keith O'Hara, Anis Zaman, Aaron Strauss

          whether the PCLT will display debug messages

computeHomography

public void computeHomography(PVector[] cam,
                              PVector[] proj)
Find the homography that relates camera to screen coordinates by using a set of known correspondences.

Parameters:

proj - an array of points in screen coordinates
